name: Ill Niño
description: '''Ill Niño''' (Spanglish wordplay meaning "ill child"; stylized as '''ill niño''') is a [[Hispanic and Latino Americans|Latin American]] [[nu metal]] band formed in [[Union City, New Jersey]], in 1998 by drummer [[Dave Chavarri]], who remains the band's sole original member. They have released seven studio albums, two EPs, and one compilation album, with total worldwide album sales exceeding 1.3 million.
